text: John Brodie (born 5 January 1896) was a Scottish footballer who played for Celtic, Dumbarton, Ayr United and Chelsea. ==References== Category:1896 births Category:Scottish footballers Category:Dumbarton F.C. players Category:Celtic F.C. players Category:Ayr United F.C. players Category:Chelsea F.C. players Category:Scottish Football League players Category:English Football League players Category:Year of death missing Category:Maryhill F.C. players Category:Association football forwards
title: John Brodie (footballer, born 1896)
